ComicInfo.Title: ... And Be a Bride of Chaos
ComicInfo.Summary: ... And Be a Bride of Chaos: Dracula hires Pendragon and Vampirella to perform at his castle; the show includes a Dracula origin story combining Drakulon, the Bram Stoker novel, and the story "The Coffin of Dracula!" from Creepy (Warren, 1964 series) #8 & 9.
